original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 7.6-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices fell by 7.6 percent, at the last week auction held on May 04, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts fell to 64,375.81 from 69,687.49 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority on May 04.
The highest price was 69,100 rupees for 1,000 nuts down from the previous week’s 76,500 rupees, while the lowest was 60,000 also down from from 66,500 rupees.
The auction offered 1,286,099 coconuts and 969,609 nuts were sold. (Colombo/May 10/2023)
